title: Riot needs to fix the LoL-Client on OSX-El Captain
body:
It crashes for no reason . Also this new OS pushed the power of all macs to the top but i can't feel anything of that power with league of legends .

1. Fix crashes 
2. Try out [METAL](https://developer.apple.com/metal/) apples new programming language , it is really powerful
3. Why not bring LoL to the Mac-Appstore ?
